I struggled for all I was worth, trying to beat at her with minimal success, and pull away with about as much of the same. I managed to pull my mouth free somehow, and I began to shout, not sure when I would stop or what I would say.

"Let me out of here, you bitch! You can't do this to me! This is inhuman! I won't be just some toy for you to stick up your fat ass!"

I just kept going, shouting as loudly as I could. I didn't even know if she could hear me, but I didn't care. Hell, it was probably better if she didn't, but I just kept going. A man could only take so much, and I'd crossed the breaking point.

It was her move, and I wasn't going to stop until she did something or I ran out of breath and screamed myself hoarse.
141111111.title: Truly Imprisoned

1411111111.content:
10 very enjoyable hours later....

I finally got up. Using all my strength, I managed to pull Jake out of my ass. Unsurprisingly, he was unconscious. No matter. I could wait until he woke. Meanwhile, I had to store him somewhere. Placing him back into his new home, I laid sideways on the couch in order to watch some television. I made sure to lay on my side so that when Jake awoke, he would be able to pull his head out and communicate.

I began watching some TV. I thought I was beginning to hear some background noise, but I assumed it was part of the drama. Around an hour later, I realized that this sound was coming from my ass, not from the TV. Muting the show, I listened to Jake's ramblings on how he was "human too", and about how "unfair" this was. This was entertaining, until he called me fat.

Pulling Jake out of my ass, I pulled him up to my face and asked "What did you say?" His expression clearly changed and he looked scared of his position way above the ground.

"For calling my ass fat, you shall be shrunken to 4 feet." A fraction of a second later, he was smaller. I brought him to my bed, and layed him down, face up.
1411111111.title: Shrinking Punishment

14111111111.content:
On and on, I shouted every angry thought that came to my head. It seemed like she couldn't hear me, but I felt at least a little better letting out. I couldn't remember so much as two words before what I was saying when I noticed her weight shift, and a hand coming in behind me, pulling me from between her cheeks and bringing me around to her face.

I winced a little in the light, my eyes adjusting to see her staring at me, looking very angry.

Immediately, I started to regret my cathartic ranting, trying desperately to remember what it was I'd said. Wait, I called her fat? And that's what she heard? Oh, I'd made a terrible mistake here.

"Wait, wait, wait. I didn't mean it. Don't shri-"

Before I could finish the sentence, I watched the room get bigger before my eyes and felt her grip tighten around me. This wasn't happening. She really shrunk me. She really just shrunk me...Oh god, this was actually happening...I had to escape as soon as I had the opportunity now, before I was too short to open the door to leave...

Unfortunately, that opportunity didn't want to present itself. Alice stood, carrying me to her room and setting me on the bed on my back. I stared at her, waiting for her next move, trying to figure out exactly how to react and make a break for it. I just had to wait for her to make a move...
14111111111.title: Mistakes Made

choices: The Art Student and his Stolen Science
The Occupants of a Seemingly Normal Apartment
Yet more, in the extremely unlikely event that they're needed.
15.content:
No...no, it wasn't any of them...

It was...
15.title: More Beginnings

151.content:
In walked a woman you had never seen before. She was gigantic, but if you weren't your size, she would be about 5'5. Her brown hair had dark red highlights added to it, and she was rather tan. A little more on the curvy side, you would have guessed she weighed around 140-150. She grinned as she picked you up.

"Ha! I got you! Finally I got you, you cheating bastard!"

You were confused to what she was talking about.

"Don't give me that look, loser. It's me. Beth. Your ex?! The one who's heart you ripped out?!"

You shakily opened your mouth to speak. "I've never dated a woman named Beth..."

She gave you a confused look. "What the hell do you mean?! You're my ex, Jake. Curly brown hair, about six feet tall..."

You stopped her again. "Excuse me miss, while my name is in fact Jake, and while it seems myself and the boy you're looking for have the same hairstyle, I'm only 5'10... I think you have the wrong guy."

I threw you down on the bed in a fit of rage. "Damn it! I used all of my shrinking formula on you!.. Well... Might as well make the most of what I have. I'll just pretend you're him. Close enough resemblance."

With that, I removed my boot, releasing a potent stink into the air.

"Now, you're gonna be a good boy and rub my foot, got it?!"
151.title: Beth, the jealous "ex".

1511.content:
While she walked into the room, I stared up in amazement. A giant! She was a giant! My head darted around, looking at the surroundings. It looked like an enormous bedroom. How the hell did this happen?

Before I could think any more on it, she started to laugh hysterically, picking me up and gloating about catching me. She...didn't quite seem altogether.

"I've never dated a woman named Beth..."

I was shaking a little, although it didn't occur to me much at the time. I was pretty sure anyone would be shaking in this situation. Perfectly natural response to being squeezed in the hand of an angry woman who thinks she's your ex.

She started to compare me to her apparent boyfriend, but I cut her off, correcting her on the facts. This was all a misunderstanding. She'd fix this and let me go...right?

The rage in her voice said no before most of the words could form from it. She threw me on the bed. I flailed through the air, crying out as I slammed into it and bounced. Would have broken my neck if I hadn't thought to tuck my head.

This girl was nuts. Absolutely nuts. And as she pulled off her boot, I nearly gagged on the stench. It might have been bad for her, but at my size, it was like a mountain of rotting corpses in the sun. And the corpses are just giant feet. But the last thing I wanted to do was piss her off any more. I'd hate to have been her Jake here.

So when she set her foot on the bed, I walked up to it, tears welling up in my eyes from the pure stink. I tried to breathe as little as possible as I started to rub what little of it I could reach at this height, pressing with as much force as I could to make up for my size. I wasn't sure if she could even feel my tiny hands, but it was better than just flat out risking not doing it. Maybe she'd be happy with me and I could turn this around?

Either way, I kept it up. Rubbing her foot, trying to hold my breath, trying not to pass out as I inhaled more and more. I just hoped she'd appreciate the effort...
1511.title: Amateur Masseuse

15111.content:
I looked at my chipping red nails, before smirking down at you, unimpressed. "Well, you're obeidant..." I started, before breaking into laughter. Unfortunately for you, you were the one I was laughing at. "Too bad you suck!" I continued to laugh. You didn't understand what was so funny, but you did feel a bit humiliated.


I stopped laughing, and grinned. "You know, Jake wasn't too good at it either. I don't think he liked the way my feet stunk." I laughed, wiggling her toes toward you, causing some more of the stink to waft your way. "But you don't mind it that much, do you?" She said, giggling. Part of you said to tell her to go to hell, but the rational part told you it was a bad idea. "Since you like my feet so much..." She began, this couldn't be good for you... "Why don't you stick your face between my toes?" I said, laughing again, although in a more sinister way this time. I suddenly stopped laughing, and looked angry. "If you know what's good for you, you'll do it, bitch." I said, in a tone that scared the hell out of you. What will you do!?
15111.title: Did you?

151111.content:
When you smirked, I looked up briefly, wincing when you laughed and swallowing the lump in my throat when you said I sucked. That didn't bode well for my future...

He didn't like the way you feet stunk. I can't imagine why... I winced away as you wiggled your toes at me, nearly getting hit in the face by one. Half a second slower reaction and I might have accidentally kissed it. I shivered at the thought. Don't mind it, my ass...

I bit my tongue, knowing better than to piss you off.

Oh, and I do love them so much. So very very much. I gagged a little, turning my head away so you couldn't see as I waited, preparing myself for what horror was coming next. But when the words came out, I shivered anyway. I really really hoped you were just taunting me.

But when your tone turned icy cold and you threatened me, I knew I had no choice in the matter.

I looked at your toes, noticeably sweaty and still wiggling in my direction. I sighed, shoulders slumping in a look of pure defeat. "Fine..."

I walked up to your foot, staring at your big toe and the one next to it as you presented them. I took a deep, deep breath and pressed my face between them. Naturally, you didn't spread them, making me force my way in, smearing my face with your sweat until my chin came to touch the skin between your toes.

I held my breath for as long as I could, letting it out slowly, but eventually giving in and needing to inhale. I breathed in my mouth, but I could practically taste the smell, wincing as tears welled up in my eyes. I hoped you wouldn't make this go on for much longer, but you were just as likely to keep me here until I died, from the stench or otherwise.
151111.title: Unwilling Submission

1511111.content:
I laughed harder as you actually obeyed and placed your face between my feet. It was absolutely agonizing for you, but absolutely hilarious to me. I laughed and pulled you out, brining you up to my face. The smirk on my face sent shivers down your spine, and goosebumps up your arms.

"Now, Jake, since you know who's in charge, you're gonna help me get back at my boyfriend, are we understood?" You went to remind her that he was her ex, but you thought that that thought was best left unsaid. You just nodded and decided to go along with whatever it was. I tossed you in my cleavage and headed off somewhere.


A few minutes later, you were at her exes house, as she watched him through the window. You caught a glimpse of him. You knew him from highschool, and everyone always mixed you two up. You weren't best friends with him, but he was a nice enough guy. How'd he end up with this psychopath?


"Now..." Beth said, starting to regrow you. She handed you the shrinking potion. "Go in there, slip this in his drink, bring him to me, and you're free to go..."
1511111.title: Defeet

15111111.content:
I was relieved when you pulled me out from between your toes, but worried when I saw the look on your face.

I listened as you spoke, biting my tongue as I had since this nightmare began. He wasn't your boyfriend, clearly. And I was starting to wonder why he ever was. Well, way past starting. But anyway.

Before I could get a word out even to agree to this, I was flying through the air, landing squarely between your breasts headfirst before I had enough time to even consider what was happening. I struggled to flip myself over, poking out of your cleavage as we left.

Wait, if she knew where he lived, why the hell did she shrink me instead!? I wanted to shout so many things at you that would get me killed, but I held it back. Looking in the window, I recognized him. He was a pretty alright guy. We'd talked in class some, though we didn't really hang out much. Suddenly, it made a little more sense that you'd mixed us up. Everyone did. Hell, we'd once made a game of it to mess with a teacher.

As you explained the plan, I started to get a hollow feeling in my chest. This was wrong. Even as I started to grow back to my original height, I felt miniscule. Mostly because I knew I wasn't going to go against your will now. If I didn't do this, I was probably dead...

I took the potion roughly, pocketing it and scowling. "I'll hold you to that..."

I watched you run off and hide out of sight, taking a deep breath and knocking on the door.

A few moments later, Jake answered, clearly a little confused. "Oh...hey, Jake. Didn't expect you. What's up?"

I'd come over once to work on a project for a class once, so it wasn't showing up out of nowhere at least. "Yeah, I wasn't really planning on it. I was just in the neighborhood bored. Thought I might swing by for a few minutes. Say hi." I tried to be as casual as I could.

Jake nodded slowly, then shrugged opening the door wider. "Riight...well, okay. Come on in."

I followed him inside to the living room, clearing my throat a little and rasping my voice. "Hey, I know I just showed up out of nowhere, and I hate to intrude, but could I bug you for a glass of water...?"

Jake chuckled a little. "If I knew you were moving in, I'd have made room upstairs, Jake." He stopped in the middle of sitting down, walking into the kitchen. "Just a second."

As soon as he was out of sight, I grabbed the bottle in my pocket, looking at the cup already there. I swore I'd make up for this somehow and poured it in, watching it blend in flawlessly and pocketing the bottle again.

Jake came back in with a cup, handing it to me. "So why me? I know you've got other friends around here."

I shrugged, watching him sit and pick up his own cup, not drinking yet. I took a drink of the water, and cleared my throat. "Much better...and I don't know. always felt like we could have been better friends, you know? Like we were practically there, we just never hung out."

Jake nodded, taking a long gulp of whatever it was in his cup, letting it set and nodded once more. "Fair point, I guess..." He licked his lips, looking at the cup. "...must be my imagination."

I took a breath, then drank a little more, hoping it would hit sooner rather than later.

"So, Jake...if we're gonna be friends," Jake swigged the rest of the drink, setting the cup down and looking at me. "Where do we...do...we..."

He started to sway a bit, grabbing his head. "Oh god...what's..."

With that, he passed out and before my eyes I watched him shrink to the very size I was just a few minutes ago. I sighed, picking him up. "Sorry, pal..."

I walked back out, finding you there and holding him out to you, a look of disgust and shame on my face. "Now we're square...and he never knows I did this."

It wasn't a request. It was a demand. For better or worse.
15111111.title: Selling One Jake Out to Save Another

151111111.content:
Beth grinned as she wrapped her hand around her ex boyfriend. "Yeah, yeah, whatever, leave." She said, not even looking at you. You decided to leave, before she changed her mind.





Months went by. You tried to ignore everything. The missing person reports in the news, the investigation news, all of it, you couldn't take it. Who knows what she was doing to him? Who knew what kind of hell that demented woman was putting him through? You couldn't take it anymore. You had to go save him...


An hour later, you found yourself outside Beth's door, ready to try and save Jake...
151111111.title: Beth's evil plan

1511111111.content:
I stood outside Beth's door, breathing slowly and readying myself. This wasn't the first time I'd come to attempt to save Jake, but it was the first I'd actually man up and make it past the door.

I couldn't take it. Couldn't take the guilt, knowing that whatever was happening to him was my fault. Whatever that sadistic bitch was doing was all because I agreed to do this to him. And just after I'd convinced him I wanted to get closer...I was scum. But that didn't mean I couldn't play the hero at least once.

I put a hand on the doorknob, let my breath out slowly, twisted it and found it was unlocked, barging in. "Beth! Come out here! I'm fixing this! This isn't going on a day longer!"

No turning back now. I took another breath, readying myself for whatever it was she was going to do when she saw me back again. I didn't know if she could shrink me again or if she'd just try to overtake me as is or what. I figured if it was the latter I had pretty good odds, and if it were the former at least I tried, damn it. The guilt would have killed me anyway.
1511111111.title: Better Late Than Never

15111111111.content:
Suddenly, as if I was expecting you, I came from behind, tracing a finger over your shoulder. "Hello, stupid boy..." I said with a certain sinister tone in my voice. Next thing you knew, you were out cold. I hit you in the head with a lead pipe.


You woke up, 3 inches tall once again. You gulped, realizing you were once again in Beth's grasp. "Hello, little man." Beth came in, a huge smirk on her face. She was wearing dominatrix gear. She stood over you, and you felt uneasy. "I'm guessing you're wondering where Jake is. Don't worry. He's where he belongs." She turned around and spread her large butt cheeks apart. There was Jake. Head first in her dirty hole. "I broke him awhile ago. He's a good little submissive bitch now. And you're about to be to. I will never... EVER be caught. And in order for me to make sure that happens, I'm gonna make you my bitch..."

She smirked again, and you could only imagine what she had planned.
15111111111.title: What did you do?

151111111111.content:
My eyes darted left to right, waiting for you to come from any direction. Any direction but from behind. When I felt your finger running along my back, a cold chill ran down my spine. As you spoke, I began to turn, but before I could even get a look at your face again, something collided with my head and everything went black.

"...ugh, my head...what the hell happened..." I woke up some time later, rubbing the goose egg on the back of my head. Quickly, I realized that the carpet below me was several times taller than it should have been. I was tiny again. Then came your voice again.

"Hello, little man."

I shivered, whipping around to stare up at you, decked out in a particular sort of lingerie that might put a man of a normal height on edge. Not a good start to this rescue plan. In fact, it was quickly starting to seem like I'd failed before I started. I couldn't find any words that didn't seem useless or laughable in this situation. But you started to speak again before I had to.

I looked on in horror as you turned around, showing me your admittedly curvy if totally evil butt and spread them, revealing a familiar tiny man shoved headfirst inside you. As you explained what you'd done to him, my spirits quickly faded. I was too late. Jake was a lost cause...and now you had a new Jake to repeat the process with...

I gulped, staring up at you while you smirked and trying to think on my feet. I sure as hell wasn't going to fight you head on...if I was going to make it out of this, I had to use my size to my advantage. I spotted a nearby dresser, or chest or something like it and sprinted toward it, realizing quickly just how slow I was tumbling over and through carpet halfway to my knees. I desperately ran, but it didn't look good...
151111111111.title: A Plan Gone Awry

152.content:
"I bet the brains here love Star Trek," I muttered to myself, stroking the slight stubble on my chin, as I looked at the ridiculously shiny and decorated surface of the teleportation device. Last week, one of the seniors in the physics department here at college, being the egotistical bastard he was, let slip about some fancy project that would win them a Nobel prize. A little buttering up and a few drinks made him a lot more talkative.

It was a lot of fancy science that an art major like myself neither cared for nor really understood. What really sparked my interest was the idea of "matter displacement". A simple change of the location measurements, and the target would resize to fit the new area. It had been a simple mistake during an early test, but it quickly developed into an intentional feature of the prototype: apples the size of tables, chairs small enough for a fly. And now, I thought as I pulled out the scrap of paper that the drunken senior scrawled some directions onto, a person tiny enough to fit in the palm of my hand.

My target: you. Nobody I knew, no one important, just some guy who works at that store down the street from the Walmart. I didn't know you. You didn't know me, just some random guy who walked through the store. Our only encounter was when I walked in, saw you, decided you'd be a good target, and bumped into you to plant a little tracking bug on your shirt. It wasn't fancy, just enough to read coordinates so I could pull you through the system without you having to be in the room beforehand.

I glanced at the clock. 1:45. Only 47 minutes after I'd bumped into you. No doubt you were still at work. I had to hurry, before someone came in or something went wrong on your end of this. Muttering again, I feverishly entered the coordinates for the destination, compacted to the one-inch goal I'm aiming for, then hooked up the tracker-receiver for the origin data. I crossed my fingers, hit the activation button, and turn to the second platform to watch in anticipation.

At first, nothing, and I faltered a little, disappointed. Then the platform hummed to life with blinking lights and the charging buzz of energy. A flash brightened the room as it received and formed the shape of a one-inch person. Eager, I crouched down over you, watching as you slowly recover from the device's effect.
152.title: The Klepto Art Student

1521.content:
I sat up as the darkness started to fade back into colors and blurs and the world started to reshape itself around me. I wasn't sure what hit me, but damn it felt like a semi-truck to the back of the head.

I rubbed my head, trying to figure out what it was. Slowly, I remembered. I was at work at the store. Typical boring day. No one really of note was coming in. Then...a while into the shift, bam. Lights out. Nothing. And then here I was with a splitting headache and a pile of questions.

I sighed, frustrated. But when I looked up, that frustration shot right back into me and was replaced by fear. A giant was kneeling over me, staring right at me. I shouted in alarm, trying to scoot backward. Behind him, I saw an equally massive room. What the hell happened? How the hell did I end up in a giant's house. And most importantly... "Who the hell are you!? What happened to me!?"

Probably not the most tactful introduction I've ever made, but I wasn't exactly feeling cordial. Staring up at him, I realized that no matter what I did, there was no getting away. He could outrun me with a single step if I booked it...and he could crush me flat if he felt like it. It all came down to what this...strangely slightly familiar-looking giant decided to do with me.
1521.title: Beamed Up, Then Down

choices: How do you react to that?
15211.content:
As much as I tried to keep a straight face, I couldn't help but crack a smile at the sight of your frightened and startled reaction to seeing me towering over you, even kneeling down as I was. The sound of your panicked yelling, reduced by your new size to little more than a soft squeak, made me chuckle a little. Oh, this was just going to be all too much fun.

"Now there's no need for such language. Honestly, what's a little manners cost? But my name's Ethan. As for what happened?" I gestured down to the cool metal platform you were on and around to the flashy computers and control panels in the room. "You're the first person who's been successfully shrunk by the new teleporter the geeks here at Franklin College. Congratulations, by the way," I added with a slight smirk as I loomed over you. At your height, you barely came up to the top of my toes inside my sneakers. Even with all my planning and preparation, I still was surprised by how puny you were.

"Jeez, I must be like a skyscraper to you," I muttered, more to myself than to you. Reaching down, I lightly poked you in the stomach with a finger, as if assuring myself you were actually real and not just a figment of my imagination. "Well, you're solid, and you're moving and breathing, so I guess I can chalk this up to a full success. Thank god for science nerds and their crazy inventions, huh?"

A beeping alarm screeched from my wristwatch, shaking me from my ponderous thoughts. "Oh, damn, classes will be letting out any minute now. Gotta hide the evidence and book it 'fore some brainy witness comes along." I reached down towards you again, my hand open to wrap around your body and pick you up.
15211.title: A Little Introduction

152111.content:
I stared up as you started to smile, then to laugh at me. Whatever you were thinking, I didn't like it. But as you spoke, you seemed friendly enough. At least, until you started to explain what happened. I looked at the sci-fi nonsense piled around me in disbelief. Was I really the victim of some cheesy movie device? Some now horrifically real cheesy movie device?

"You shrunk me!? Why!?"

I was angry. Too angry to think about shaping up my attitude just because this bastard was offended. But you seemed more preoccupied with your own thoughts, probably about whatever plan you seemed to have for me, than you were in my pathetically tiny shouting. Something about being like a skyscraper... I stood up, crossing my arms and watching you nervously but trying to look somewhat threatening in my anger. It didn't work.

You snapped out of it, poking me in the stomach and knocking me over. I took a swing at your finger, but you were already pulling it away and didn't seem to notice the tiny movement of my awkward, half-falling over punch.

Suddenly a deafening beeping started to screech. I shouted, closing my eyes covering my ears, half expecting them to start bleeding through my fingers. I heard you mutter about classes as you shut off the alarm, and when I opened my eyes again, you were reaching for me. I had no time to react and in a second, I was wrapped in your fingers being lifted hundred of feet at my size to your face level.

"Let me go! What are you gonna do with me? Why did you do this...?"

I shouted at first, but became quieter and quieter as I stared at your enormous face directly in front of me. I was in no position to be shouting questions...I had to play it cool. At least relatively. Not piss off the guy that could kill me in a dozen ways without more than a second thought.

But what was he going to do?
152111.title: In the Hands of a Giant

1521111.content:
My fist opened up, your tiny inch-tall figure sprawled out in the center of my palm; my fingers loomed around and over you, curled and ready to clench tight again at any moment. That same amused grin was still on my face. I just couldn't get over how tiny and helpless and meager you were. Taking just a moment, I playfully tossed you up into the air a little and caught you in my hand a couple times. But I couldn't linger for long. As you recovered from your aerial adventure, I replied to your questions. "Simply put, you're my new friend, little buddy. We're gonna have all kinds of fun together, you'n'me! But I gotta skedaddle before I'm caught here, so let's save the big talk for later." I chuckled again. "Heh, no pun intended."

My hand brought you close to my chest, where my free fingers pulled out the lip of the shirt pocket so I could carefully slip you in. The little pocket was the size of a room to you, and the space compacted briefly as I ever so gently patted the pocket with my hand. "There we are. Now you just stay in there for a bit 'til I get out of here and back to Birch Building."

Satisfied with the containment of my miniaturized man, I quickly reset all the panels to where they'd been before I came in. The soft hum of the machinery faded away as I flicked switches and pressed buttons. As I worked, I hummed a catchy little tune and thought that maybe I might have to come back here again at some point. Later, though; there's enough in my pocket to keep my free time busy for a while.

Grabbing my cap, I scooted out the door just in time to avoid a couple teachers rounding the corner. In their argumentative conversation, they wouldn't have noticed me even if I hadn't ducked into the bathroom. Grinning at how easy this was, I took the opportunity to relieve my bladder before heading out. After that, it was smooth sailing all the way to the apartment buildings on campus.

"Hey! Jeff? Mark? You guys here?" I called out as I closed and locked the door behind me. No response; perfect. They shared one bedroom while I had the other, which gave me just the privacy I was wanting. Quickly, I beelined towards my room and locked the door, hanging my cap on a peg on the wall. I kicked off my shoes and climbed onto the bed, leaning back against the headboard. Looking down at my chest, I gently reached in, grabbed your little figure, and set you on the sloped surface of my chest. "Now we're home with a lot more privacy. Did you enjoy the ride, little fella?"
1521111.title: Quick Escape

15211111.content:
As I was tossed in the air I let out a small scream, stopping when I fell back down into your palm and managing to keep from doing at again as I was tossed again and again. Finally it stopped, and I took a deep breath, looking up as you spoke.

"Friend? Man, if this is how you make friends... well, I see why you'd need to do it this way..." I mumbled, worried what sort of fun you had in mind. But before I could let out any more snark I was slipping off your hand into a newly opened pocket. It was massive. The size of a room if I weren't tiny, and too steep to climb the sides of with anything resembling ease. Great. Really wish I'd done more pull-ups at the gym...

When you stated moving, I was tossed lightly side to side with each step, pressing on the pocket's sides to try to steady myself. The motion was making me a little sick. Really wished I could at least see where I was being taken.

But that wasn't going to happen and my bumpy ride carried on. I laid down in the pocket and found it helped a bit. Made it more like a hammock. Easier to take the swinging. I heard you call for what could only be your roommates after the door of what I assumed was your apartment opened. Through another door, I felt you moving around, then saw your fingers reaching in the pocket for me. I didn't struggle. Wasn't much purpose in it. I wasn't exactly in some impenetrable fortress.

As I was lifted out, I saw I was in what must be your room as I was set on your chest, looking up at you on the bed.

"Well, I certainly couldn't call it riding first class."

Jokes. I should be pissed. And I making jokes. Still, I laughed just a little, trying to remain stern as I remembered what you'd done to me. No matter how pleasant you seemed to be, this was unacceptable. And the sound of needing privacy...

I crossed my arms, but when I spoke, I wasn't shouting any more, more nervous and confused than angry at this point.

"So, Ethan. We're alone. No sci-fi nerds to come bust you here. What are you planning? And why me?"
15211111.title: Pocketed

152111111.content:
I looked down at you on my body, the expanse of my chest rising and falling with each breath. "Like I said before, you're gonna be my new friend. I've got a few others, but they're really busy most of the time. So you're here for the rest of the time! We'll hang out, eat junk food, watch movies, fool around a bit, friend stuff... hrm, I guess you couldn't really handle a controller at that size, so two-player gaming's off the list." My eyes lit up a little. "Ooh, and since I have mostly studio classes, you can come with me around campus most of the time. I might have to have Mark or Jeff keep you company every now and then, make Becca, but I'll try to be around as much as possible."

I lightly poked you in the chest again. "Beyond fun, I don't actually have a plan really. Honestly, I didn't even think of this sort of thing until a few days ago. Some nerd blabs about a really fancy machine, and a rogue thought sparks the coolest idea I've ever had." My torso shook beneath you as I chuckled.

I stroked my hand against my stubbled chin. "And, well, I guess it wasn't entirely random. You looked dead-bored. Like you'd just watched a paint-drying marathon all night. I kinda figured you might like some excitement. And if this isn't exciting, I don't know what is. Plus, you don't have to work for pennies or worry about taxes or food money or any annoying things like that anymore, now!"

Grabbing you, I rolled over towards my nightstand and set you on the wooden surface next to a few things: a partly open matchbox with some sort of soft fabric stuffed inside, an upended bottle cap, and a bell dangling on string from the table lamp. "See? Made you a few things. A little bed you can sleep in sometimes, a dish for some food if I need to go out for just a bit, and a bell to get my attention with. I'm a bit of a light sleeper, so it should wake me up if you need something in the middle of the night." I shrugged. "It's nothing fancy, but it'll do for when I'm sleeping or something."

"Anyways!" I hopped up off the bed and stretched my arms. "I could use a quick shower 'fore dinner, and you should probably take one since you just got off your, uh, last shift of work."I gently scooped you up in my hand, fingers cradled protectively around you as I lift you up to hold you near my chest. 152111111.title: The What and the Why

1521111111.content:
I listened patiently to your explanation, admittedly calming down a little as I maintained my balance on your rising and falling chest. "So I'm really just here as a friend..." Could be worse. I wasn't sure how I felt about being passed to your friends here and there, but you seemed friendly enough, depending on your definition of 'fool around'...

When you poked me in the chest, I slipped, tumbling backward, but managing to get back onto my feet as my legs swing over my head. It felt a little impressive. "I mean, I heard about this thing they made, too. But I didn't think anyone would do this...or that it would actually work."

And you were right. I was bored. So bored. That job was a ridiculously long exercise on staying awake with no stimulation whatsoever. A monkey could probably fill my position if the law allowed for it. Had to admit, 'you seemed pretty cool' was one of the better compliments I'd received lately. Wait, that was where I recognized you from! You were the guy at work I thought patted me on the back! Damn, if I had only thought to look for...some sci-fi junk I wouldn't have believed in just an hour back.

As I was set on the nightstand, I looked at the set-up. I had to admit, it was a pretty alright deal for a guy my size. But I'd be lying if I didn't feel like a new pet being shown his cage and food bowl. Still, he went through the effort...he did seem to care at least a little.

As I was scooped up again, I listened to your offer, flushing red. You were so casual about showering together. I'd never really been into guys as far as I was concerned, and I'd be lying if I said I wasn't paranoid about the sorts of shenanigans that showering with you could bring. But suppose I did opt for the sink and something went wrong. Or a roommate came busting in and found me. I imagined being pulled down the slightly-too-open drain, or being taken by a much less caring roommate for god knows what. I sat there in your palm, thinking. I could feel some of the warmth coming off your chest from where I was being held as I thought, weighing every option for a long minute or two and sighing when I came to my decision.

"I think...considering everything, it might be better if I...join you." I practically had to push the words out, but in the end, I liked the odds of being naked off the bat and risking you than risking something going on in the sink alone or something else going wrong without you right there. "That's my call...and my name's Jake, by the way. Never mentioned before..."

The introduction didn't really fit the flow of conversation, but damned if I was going to shower with someone who didn't even know my name. It felt important, for some reason. I sat there, waiting nervous and paranoid for you to make your next move.
1521111111.title: Hard Decisions

15211111111.content:
I lightly smacked myself in the head and chuckled. "Oh, dude, I'm sorry! All this excitement got to me and I forgot to ask. Nice to meet you, Jake. I'd shake hands, but that'd be kind of hard to do now." Slowly, I started to walk towards the bathroom, still carefully holding you up by my chest in my hand. If you listened closely, you might have been able to hear the soft beating of my heart or the whooshing inflation and deflation of my lungs, just inches away from your tiny form.

The bathroom, like the rest of the apartment, was quite nice for the generally affordable fee that the administration charged. A countertop sink took up part of one wall, while the toilet and shower stall - one of those standing ones where the glass was clear but just gave you blurry images of whoever was inside - stood on the other side of the room. There was also a little table with piles of towels and general cleaning supplies, almost crammed into the space between the counter and the wall. It's onto the counter that I carefully deposited you, the cool stone beneath you a striking counterpart from the soft warm sponginess of my hand.

Humming to myself again, I turned on the shower to let the water warm up a little. As the glass of the mirror and the stall began to fog up a little, I walked back over to you. Even at the incredible size difference, it was quite easy to tell how apprehensive you were. Setting aside my generally playful attitude for a moment, I crouched down to near eye-level with the counter.

"Don't worry about sharin' a shower, Jake. It's just natural body stuff, and there's nothing to be ashamed of about just being naked around someone else." I scratched my head slightly. That was how I thought, probably a bit influenced by the live drawing sessions in class. After a while, you'd get used to platonicly seeing strangers naked... "Plus it's just efficient and quick. I've shared a few showers with Mark or Jeff sometimes when time's short in the morning." Smiling a little, I raised my hand. "I solemnly pledge to not abuse your man-body in the steamy confines of a college shower-stall. Scout's honor." I decided not to say that I'd never actually been a Boy Scout. Dropping back to my usual tone, I couldn't help but add, joking, "Abstinence till the third date and all that."

With that out of the way, I stood back up my full height, towering once more above your shrunken form on the countertop. My hands grabbed at the collar of my shirt and heaved it over my head, off my torso, and onto the floor to be tidied up later. The air had developed an almost muggy heat from the shower, and I sighed in some relief as my bare skin felt open air. I was not particularly muscular, but there were hints of definition, the slight cut of muscle here and there. It's accented by the small amounts of brown chest hair, including a definitive treasure trail that led down into my pants.

There was a soft pop as I undid the button, then a string of metallic clinks as the fly was unzipped. With a short flourish, my pants dropped down, revealing a pair of light blue boxer briefs. Quickly stepping out of my pants, I tugged off my socks and tossed all of it towards the shirt to add to the pile of laundry to clean up later. Leaving only one piece.

Still humming as casually as ever, I pulled down my underwear, bending over to step out of the boxer briefs and then toss them over to the laundry. As I stood up, all was laid bare. If you were looking, you'd see that, like the rest of me, my groin was generally average. A slightly small flaccid length, circumsized, dangled over a perhaps larger than normal ballsack. 15211111111.title: Down to Nothing, or Up to Something?

Your rhythmic breathing was a little relaxing, but I was still tense. I wasn't looking forward to this. And as you set me on the counter, I started to get the feeling you recognized it.

Your explanation was a good one. It was a pretty normal thing. Athletes showered together, and if it was something you did often, what reason was there for me to worry? I felt a little better about it all even with the joking laugh on the end of it.

152111111111.title: Preparations

1521111111111.content:
Having offered what reassurances I could, though they likely weren't held in high regards only an hour after we'd "met", I simply offered a smile as I looked down at you. Like most any man, curiosity draws my eye south for the brief glimpse before you cover yourself with your hands.

As gently as before, my fingers wrap around you and bring you into my hand, where you're held in an open palm near my chest as I walk. Even though I had just done this only a matter of minutes ago, everything felt different thanks to the complete lack of any clothes at all. Instead of holding my hand right up against my chest, it hovered about an inch or so away so as not to make you feel too uncomfortable.

"You'll have to bear with me; this is the first time I've showered with anyone on this sort of scale..." I said as I climbed into the stall and closed the door behind me. The air inside was like a sauna, and especially muggy to you at your size. The same amount of water in the steamy air needed to give my skin a slick coat of wet mist was enough to drench your whole body; the particles in the air that cling to you were, at your inch-tall height, the size of large raindrops. Bending down, I carefully set you on the floor of the stall, sleek stainless steel that' been warmed by the shower's constant stream. You were not in the direct line of fire from the showerhead far above - as you were, it would have been like a waterfall crashing down on you - but between the rebounding spray off the floor and the moisture in the air that clings to you in larger and larger beads, there's enough water to constantly run down and off your body as if you were in a regular shower at normal height. For cleaning material, I broke off a tiny piece of soap, about the size of a half-used bar to you, and handed it down to you. "Just toss it at the drain when you're done with it; it's not much, so there's not really a reason to hang onto it." Then I poured out a small puddle of body wash and another of shampoo/conditioner for you. "That should do for you," I said with that same reassuring smile as before. I placed a washcloth over the drain in the event of anything moving you towards it, but, I reasoned as I stood back up, you would be fine. My feet at the moment were on either side of you, so if you were to look up, it would have been like staring up at an office building from the front door, except that the office building was accented with a dangling manhood whose winking eye would seem to return your gaze in kind.

Thinking that you could - and would prefer to - take care of yourself for the rest, I started scrubbing myself down with the soap. As I scrubbed, I began humming, as casual about showering with you as I had been about holding you in my hands or talking to you while you sat on my chest. After each full-body scrub of soap or body wash, I stepped into the direct stream and let the force of the nozzle's spray push the foam and dirt off of me and towards the drain, where the water would seep through the fabric and the rest would stick to the fabric that would get washed in the laundry anyways.

Every now and then, I looked down at you, checking on you. If you were looking at me, I would smile at you again, hoping that this wasn't too terribly awkward for you.
1521111111111.title: Into The Shower

15211111111111.content:
As you picked me up, I maintained my best semblance of dignity, which wasn't easy when you were an inch or so tall and being cradled naked by another, also naked, guy. At least he was trying to be reassuring.

When we entered the shower, the heat hit me like a wall. I'd been in saunas before, and it was an equivalent experience. Within a few seconds, my entire body was soaked. Breathing became a little difficult, but I adjusted quickly enough.

As you set me down, morbid curiosity got the best of me and I found it difficult not to take another look at what was hanging there, and what would be hanging over me the entire time we did this. But I tried to be discrete. Where I was, I wasn't being crushed by a waterfall, but there was more than enough water to do what I needed to. I took the sliver of soap graciously, watching you pour the puddles of shampoo and bodywash. This wasn't a terrible set-up. Carefully holding the soap so I didn't lose it to the slight current of water at my feet, I took a bit of shampoo and dealt with that first, scrubbing my head fairly thoroughly.

Then I started to rub myself down with the soap, being fairly thorough. Every now and again, I kept finding my eye drawn upward where I'd inevitably end up looking at your junk, mostly because of the angle I had looking, and partly because it seemed to demand attention, almost returning my stare when I occasionally glanced.

I tried to focus on what I was doing, finishing with the soap and letting it go like you said and grabbing a scoop of bodywash, thoroughly rubbing myself clean with that. After that, I just sort of enjoyed the warmth of the water, letting everything rinse off and waiting until you'd finished your own business. Occasionally, splashes of water running off of you would drop near me here or there, but nothing nearly as bad as I might have expected. All in all, this wasn't as terrible as I'd built it up to be.

Glancing up, I looked past the obvious to see how you were coming along, making eye contact briefly and realizing what it would look like, flushing red and immediately looking back to my own level. Totally not awkward.
15211111111111.title: Showering with a Giant

152111111111111.content:
As I showered, I stood near one end of the stall, the hot stream from the nozzle running down from overhead. I was turned towards you, partly to keep an eye on you on occasion and partly to give you the chance to look if you were so inclined. As it turned out, your curiosity understandably did get the better of you more than a few times. It was only natural to be curious about what other guys were packing, and at your size, everything about me was monumental and landscape-like. Not at all shy, I let you look as you pleased as we showered, scrubbing ourselves with soap and wash and shampoo and rinsing off in the steamy moisture of the sealed space.

Once, near the end, our eyes met, and you quickly glanced away. Even so far down on the shower floor, it was easy to see that your face had turned bright red, and you were doing your very best to look anywhere else. I couldn't help but be a little amused about your shyness, but I held back a chuckle that might otherwise have seemed derisive or tormenting. Instead, I merely finished rinsing the last of the shampoo from my hair and gave myself a quick once over to wash away remaining suds or soapy substance.

The tap squeaked slightly as I turned it to off, and the loud hiss of the nozzle faded to an end as the water dropped, then stopped all together. As drops pooled and splashed from the hanging head, I kneeled down to gently scoop you up in a motion that was beginning to get more practiced and experienced. As before, I held you near but not against my chest, not wanting to make our shared nudity any more uncomfortable for you. Moving quickly to the sink, I grabbed a couple of tissues from the box. The first I laid out on the counter, near where you'd left your clothes, like a rug; then I set you down on it and gave you the second to dry yourself off with. It wasn't perfect, but, I reasoned to myself, it would likely be more comfortable than a towel, whose individual threads would have each felt like a thick robe rubbing against your little body.

Smiling as reassuringly as before, I paced back over to the shower stall and the bath mat before I dripped too much water on the floor. There I grabbed a clean towel from the rack and started to dry myself off, scrubbing vigorously to remove as much moisture as possible from my bare body.

Once we were both dry and you'd redressed for some sense of modesty, I carried you back to my room. There you were set on the bed while I grabbed some underwear and my pajamas - a pair of soft grey shorts and a simple white shirt - to put on. Coming over, I sat down on the bed next to you and carefully picked you up. As I laid back, I set you on my chest again and said, "I'll see if I can't shrink you some clothes in a couple days so you have more than just the one outfit." Hopefully, that might make you feel a little more comfortable about your new lot in life. "I'd do it tomorrow, but the lab's closed for a bit of construction and repair. So we'll do it on Saturday. I've got some clothes I can spare from my closet here."

From behind and beneath you, my stomach grumbled. I laughed a little sheepishly and gently patted it as I looked at you. "Sorry, haven't had anything to eat since breakfast. Didn't really have time for lunch. I bet you're probably hungry, right? What are you in the mood for? Chinese, pizza, or hot dogs?"
152111111111111.title: Back to Clothes and Relaxing

I'm not-" Before I could finish, my own stomach growled. It seemed to be contagious, and I remembered I hadn't had a break at work today. Had to work through it because of the incompetent guy I was working with. "No...no, I am hungry. But not picky. Let's say...pizza. That sounds fine. Whatever toppings."

1521111111111111.title: Dinner Plans

15211111111111111.content:
I smiled down at you. It was nice to see how you were adjusting to your new size and everything that came with it, even if only very slowly. You seemed very grateful about the offer to go out of my way to get you more than just the clothes you were wearing. Of course, I'd still have to figure out how to wash clothes that fit someone who was smaller than a toothpick. Maybe a toothbrush and some soap in a sink. All this work and planning amazed me. Then we were off to the kitchen, out of the greater privacy of the bedroom and the bathroom and into the more public area of the apartment. I like pepperoni, so we'll do that one." Closing the door, I set the frozen, shrink-wrapped food down and turn the oven on to pre-heat. A nagging thought crossed my mind again. "So, uh... I hope the shower thing wasn't too awkward. I mean, we're probably going to be doing that a lot..." I shrugged a little. "I dunno. I guess I just wanted to see if there was anything I could do to help make it easier."

152111111111111111.title: Tension Explained
