I'd rather stick with one of you, reckless as that may be. But I will hide if that's what it takes... I feel like I'm the one mucking up plans and making everything stressful here and I feel bad."

I don't know why I was trying to take some of the heat off of Jamie. It was wildly irresponsible to host a party at someone else's house without telling that person, but she seemed to mean well enough.

I stood in Jamie's hand, again looking between the two of them and waiting for a plan. "Just tell me what you guys think is best and I'll do it."
155321111111111111111111.title: Let's Have a Party

choices: Jessica, the showgirl who deserves better?
15533.title: More Slots

choices: But it wasn't a condom, was it?
155331.content:
"Hey, baby, come on, don't be that way!" complained the drunkard, as I shoved him out of the private showroom. "Come back when you have some cash, why don'tcha?" I yelled, and shut the door, slumping against it. I sighed, and slumped up against the door to prop it shut...and unceremoniously pulled a 50 dollar bill out of my cleavage. Sure, it wasn't right to steal from a drunken asshole, but when you make minimum wage getting fucked in the ass in a strip club...literally, I mused...sacrifices had to be made to stay afloat.

Slipping the bill into my purse, I stood up and locked the door. Even though I technically should be performing or giving lap dances right now, I decided to, just once, relax in here. Jack wouldn't fire me anyway. The girls say good things about me, and the men love me too much. But it left something to be desired.

Straightening my stockings, (or trying to, as they seemed to fall apart if I put any amount of force on them), I slumped onto the heart shaped bed, hitting the unnaturally stiff pillow with a thud. As I hit it, I could hear an object on the opposite side of the pillow end up getting knocked into the air. Probably a used condom, I guessed. Sighing, I closed my eyes. Maybe I'd be able to get a good nap in before some other drunk guy comes in to lose their virginity...
155331.title: Was it?

choices: Did she hear me? Or would I have to get her attention some other way?
1553311.content:
Groaning and sitting up, I heard a woman's voice shout "Come back when you have some cash, whydon'tcha?" and immediately hoped she wasn't the reason I was laying here with a splitting headache. She was so loud. Like, impossibly loud. Impressive acoustics in here, if nothing else... I rubbed my eyes as my vision started to come back to me, opening them and freezing at what I saw.

She was impossibly loud apparently because she was impossibly large. I stared in amazement as who must have been the source of the shouting slumped against an equally impossibly huge door in the distance, pulling a bill out from between her tits and depositing it in her purse. As your senses filter back in, you become more and more aware of your surroundings. The first thing you notice is that it's rather hot. Not unbearably so, but certainly enough to be noticeable and unwanted. The second is that the air itself feels... well, thicker, for lack of a better word. It takes a bit more effort to breathe, and it almost feels like inhaling smoke until you take a few deep breaths and settle into a better, easier pace. The third thing you notice is the odd taste in the air. Just like smelling fresh rain or feeling an odd texture, it's hard to really describe the sensation that passes across your taste buds with each long inhale and exhale. The closest approximation you could give might be to say that the air tastes "warm".

As the blurs around you settle into distinct shapes, you begin to realize that the odd qualities of the air are almost certainly the least of your concerns. You're standing at the bottom of some vast chamber with steel blue walls and an odd, texture-less white ceiling. All around you, gigantic wooden structures rise above you, each one the size of a building. The more you look at them, however, the more you begin to realize that they aren't buildings at all. In fact they rather look like furniture scaled up to ridiculous sizes. There's a dresser, a skyscraper-like bookcase, a desk of some sort, and even a massive bed that's the size of a warehouse. A soft beige carpet, as soft as a shag rug, rises up around your legs like short grass, undercutting just how small you must be.

As you look down at the thick carpet, you realize that you're a little different as well. For one, you're entirely naked. At least that makes the heat a little more tolerable, if nothing else. When your neck tilts, you feel an odd tingle against your spine. It takes a bit of stretching, but you manage to reach a hand against your upper back. Your prodding fingers feel an unusual bump between your shoulder blades; there's some sort of circular shape under your skin. The last and possibly least worrisome thing you notice is that there's some kind of black shape on your left hip. It's at such an odd angle that you have trouble making it out as a sketchy 3 that looks like it was written onto you with an enormous permanent marker.

Your hearing comes back as your ears pop, and you become aware that you aren't the only living thing in this enormous chamber that must be some sort of bedroom. There's a soft rhythmic sound that's so strangely amplified that it takes you a moment to realize it's the sound of someone or something really big that's breathing. It doesn't take much logic to look towards the bed, but no amount of preparation could have braced you for the strange sight that greets you.

The figure is somewhere around a dozen times your size, at the same scale as the enormous furniture and grass-like carpet. It's clearly humanoid, but that's where most similarities end. The whole being is oddly colored. The head, turned away from you, has odd triangular ears instead of the oval-shaped human kind. The figure has the cream-colored sheets around its ankles, which allows your observant eyes to pick up a number of extra pieces of the puzzle. Like you, they're completely naked, and that allows you to make out the backside of a giant ballsack (oddly tan and dotted with brown spots) between their legs. The giant, who is almost certainly male, also has what appears to be a thick, fluffy tail that sprouts from the base of their spine and goes down to at least the halfway point of the lower leg. As the whole picture slowly snaps together, you realize that the figure isn't colored, at least not in the traditional sense. Rather, they're covered in thick fur that ranges from a very dark brown to a warm tan. It's not unlike the pattern of a German shepherd, for the most part, and the whole figure (at least, what you can see of him from the backside) looks like how you might imagine a mixture of a shepherd and a human to turn out.

The giant canine shifts slightly and groans. He's clearly asleep, which leaves you to decide your first step here. You're all alone, naked, on the floor of some strange bedroom occupied by an even stranger and equally naked half-dog titan. You could try to get his attention somehow; there's enough of the sheets off the side of the bed that you could probably climb up without too much of a hassle. Or there's some clean clothes in a basket on the floor nearby. You could just climb onto that and wait until he goes to get dressed. A third option might be to try and get out of the room. There's just enough room under the door for you to squeeze out if you decide to venture elsewhere...

Another huff from the giant snaps you back to your senses. Whatever you do, you should try to do it soon...

155332221.content:
It was a dark and stormy night. The smoldering volcano lit the blackness with an ominous red glow, its lava bubbling and splashing up, as if reaching up towards the lip. As the lightning flashed across the landscape, it illuminated a tall, wicked castle with a lone, high-peaked tower. A single, winding road led up to the main gate, though it was rarely used by any except the inhabitants. For this was a feared place, where none dared set foot, for fear of the nightmarish evils that lay within...

Or, at least, that's how this story might have begun.

Some of it was true, of course. There was a castle on a mountain that was rarely visited, but that was because only a handful of people in the nearest village remembered its location, and they had no interest in it. There was a volcano, but it had been dormant for a long while and wasn't likely to erupt anytime soon. It was night, but though the weather had been dreary and raining for several hours, there was no booming thunder or dramatic flashes of lightning to add to the ambiance of the moment.

Sarfas Icebark was not to be deterred, though. He'd already made his plans, and he would carry them through, dramatic tone or not. The Hunter's Moon was at its peak, and he could feel its power all around him as the focusing lenses around the tower chamber harnessed the lunar magic into specially selected chunks of copper ore. The moon's light shone down through the wide windows, illuminating the man's figure. His skin was quite pale and his blue veins made dramatic lines across his arms and face. His eyes were a metallic silver hue and gleamed in the flickering torch light.

He checked the lines he had drawn on the stone floor in red clay and muttered to himself. The circle was painstakingly drawn and surrounded by odd organic spirals and shapes, which in turn were surrounded by a carefully placed circle of candles that danced with small violet flames.

In the darkest corner, by the staircase that led down into the castle, a pair of eyes reflected the various light sources in two small glints. The eyes' owner watched Sarfas as he paced around the room.

"That should be all the preparations. The circle's set, and the focus ores are aligned." His eyes flicked about, only briefly pausing on the being in the corner. "Now or never," he murmured.

He stepped into the small triangle on the circle's edge and lifted his hands and face to the Hunter's Moon. "I call upon Deduron, Lord of the Hunt, whose amber eye graces the land and observes the devoted! Your power and thirst for blood rises to its glorious peak now, and I plead you to lend a morsel of your magic to my summon this night!" A wind began to pick up within the room, and Sarfas' black robe flapped about as he spoke louder. "By the power of the moon's brilliance and the earth's blessing, I reach through the walls of dimensions, weakened on these most spiritual of nights, and bring forth a denizen of the wicked underworld to do my bidding! Azetaroth, I summon thee! Accept my offering and heed my call!" At the last words, he drew a steel dagger and slit his palm. As blood dripped from his open hand, he placed his hand at the triangle's forward point and cried out, "I summon thee!"

The candle flames roared into violet pillars of fire and cast the room into intense light. Then, as quickly as they'd risen, the flames went out, leaving the chamber a little darker. Sarfas lifted his head, expecting to look up into the face of a wicked black beast. Nothing? But the ores were gone, and the spell had clearly taken effect. Had he miscalculated, and the binding circle was incomplete? No, he reassured himself, he'd checked it multiple times to be sure.

With a sense of some dread, his eyes slowly lowered from even standing to stare down at the center of the circle. There, on the floor, lay a tiny figure, clothed in odd garments that Sarfas would be unable to recognize as a t-shirt and boxers. He must have been only four inches tall and seemed to be otherwise completely normal.

"What? What is this?" Sarfas snapped, his voice rising in some anger. "Some little beast? I called for a high demon, not a meager pest!" He flung the dagger in his hand at the wall, where it clattered harmlessly against the ground.

He moved to grab the odd thing and drew his hand back at the last second. Wait... Demons were known for trickery. This could all be an illusion, intended to make him lower his guard and break the circle's seal. If that were the case, he'd be releasing the demon and all its dark power. He bit his lip and looked thoughtfully at the summoned thing.

Suddenly it began to stir, as if awakening from sleep. He watched it get up and frowned down at it. If the being tried to move out of the circle on its own, it would feel a significant amount of pain. "You. What are you? The circle binds you to answer the summoner's queries by the laws of the contract!"

It was a rush of energy surging into me, sapping majority of the power from my brother. It felt great, I could feel the mysterious aura in my body grow stronger. Of course, I didn't want to kill him, so I snapped out of the trance and let go of him, interrupting the spell. And... that's when I realized, the spell did more than just sap potential magic energy for myself. Why, he was also shrunken down to a mere inch in height!

No wonder why this was a forbidden spell, but a sly smirk grew on my face. I instantly thought of all of the things I could do now, because I was literally the bigger sister. A spell like this practically gave me two end results, in which I love already.

Kneeling down on the floor where my tiny brother was starting to gain consciousness, I pluck him up into the air by his shirt with my index finger and thumb, and slowly bringing him up to face level.

"It's about time you woke up Jake, I bet you're just scared shitless right now," I couldn't help myself from teasing him, especially by how he was practically powerless at this size. He can try all he want, but I'm the one in charge here. All thanks to the power of magic.
1553322221.title: The Sisterly Witch

choices: Could she help? Would she help?
15533222211.content:
The first thing I see as my eyes finally start to adjust is my younger sister's face. But unlike usual, her face takes up my entire vision. "Angie, get off..." I sleepily try to push her away, hands pressing against something but not having much effect.

Suddenly, I feel a tugging sensation on the back of my neck and I'm being hoisted somewhere like the prize in a claw machine. "Hey! What the hell?" I rub my eyes, then try to pull away from the collar of my shirt that's now threatening to strangle me as I hang from whatever's grasped me. I look forward and again I see my sister's enormous face, realizing now that she wasn't just close or hovering over me, she was actually enormous,

"It's about time you woke up Jake," she began as I pulled myself away from the strangling collar of my shirt. "I bet you're just scared shitless right now."

I stared at Angie in disbelief for a number of reasons. How did she get so big? Or...how did I get so small? (Judging by the room around us it was the latter.) Why was she currently threatening to hang me with a casual pinched grasp on my shirt? And why did she seem so nonchalant about this whole situation?

"A...Angie? What the hell? What happened to me?" I start, fluctuating somewhere between fear and anger. I try to struggle out of her grasp, but I realize that the only way I'm going anywhere is if she moves me or if I struggle out of my shirt and plummet...hundreds of feet to my death. "You've... you've got to fix this! I don't know what happened, but you have to help me! Right now!"

It was a command, but I didn't feel or sound very commanding. I'd come in here... to help her with something. That's right. But when I walked in, everything just sort of went black until I woke up being lifted by my now colossal sister. This wasn't good. "Angie, I mean it! Help me!"
15533222211.title: Waking From a Dream Into a Nightmare?

choices: Speak up, I can't hear you!
155332222111.content:
This was just too priceless. It really was. While most would probably panic to see that they've shrunken to this size, my brother's reaction was definitely one I wouldn't forget. Actually, while I didn't plan for him to shrink like this from the spell I used, this was a whole lot better than what I expected. For a moment, I did take into consideration about helping my "little" brother out. Well, sucks to be him then.

"Meh, don't feel like it," I shrugged, simple as that. "Just let me have fun with this at least, Jake. I mean, I was the one that did this to you in the first place, and I don't really feel like turning you back to normal any time soon. Soooo... sorry not sorry."

Oh man, I could see the outright shock in my brother's face once I brought this newsflash to him. Might as well suck the fun out of this, because I did literally dangled my brother's life in my hands. Not even giving him a chance to talk, I stuck out my tongue and pressed his tiny form against my taste buds facefirst. Ugh, okay, so my brother didn't taste that pleasant, and it would be too quick to just swallow him up there. Oh well, I kept him pressed against my tongue until a few minutes pass, and after that I plucked him off of my tongue, dropping him onto the palm of my hand.

"What was that you were going to say? I didn't quite catch that."

This was going to be a load of fun for me, and a load of torture for little Jake.
155332222111.title: Sorry Not Sorry

choices: Somehow, I didn't think that would work...
1553322221111.content:
I couldn't believe what Angie was saying. She did this to me? How? Why? I had so many questions, but I was too stunned by her sheer lack of care. My anger turned to concern. I didn't know what sort of fun she wanted to have like this, but I had the sneaking suspicion is wasn't going to be good for me. Angie immediately confirmed my suspicion. Before I could actually open my mouth to say something, she opened hers wide before me. "Angie, no! Stop!"

But she didn't stop. I shut my eyes and prepared for the worst, only opening them when I realized I wasn't sliding down her gullet to oblivion. She was pressing me square into her tongue. I struggled against the slimy beast to no avail. No matter how I pressed away from her, the slick surface and the force of her finger at my back kept me pinned. Her taste buds were the size of my head, continuously grabbing hold of it, getting a nice good taste. I could only hope that she didn't like my flavor.

It felt like she held me there forever. It could have been minutes, could have been hours for all I knew. When you're being drenched in your little sister's (If I could even call her that now) saliva, your perception gets a little foggy. Eventually I gave up pointlessly struggling and just sort of laid there until finally she picked me back up and hung me back in front of her face, limp and damp, and taunted me like that was nothing.

I took a few deep breaths and composed myself as best a person can in this situation. "Angie... I don't know how you did this, or what I did you make you want to, but please, stop. Change me back. I'll do anything!"
1553322221111.title: Distasteful in all Regards

choices: You should've been careful on what you say around me. Hehehehehe...
15533222211111.content:
Well, how should I go about this? If I did restore him back to normal (which apparently, I didn't know the solution to that at all), why would I pass up on this opportunity? This was probably the only time I would get to mess around with him as my little bitch. I could do whatever I want with him, and I could make sure he doesn't speak a word about it. Though, I was also going to make sure that he'll remember this for as long as he can. Because what would be the fun of it if he doesn't even remember a damn thing?

I tilted my head to the side when he practically begged to be restored to normal size. One word happened to catch my attention, and a jeering smile grew on my face. Oh man, Jake should've phrased that a bit more carefully than he did there.

"... anything?" A few chuckles couldn't be held in as I basically echoed out that one word. Before he could comprehend on what kind of hell he brought himself into, I pulled the socks off of my feet, a putrid smell of my footsweat spreading across the room. While it was all fresh air for him one second, the next second he was instantly plunged in-between my toes. I knew my feet smelled bad since I neglected to shower at times, but I could only imagine on how bad it was for someone that small as him.

"In that case, Jake, you've got yourself a lot of work to do... You did say "anything," riiiiiight?" my cruel teasing continued, using my fingers to force his face onto the skin of my feet.
15533222211111.title: From Big Brother to Little Servant

155332222111111.content:
A horrible chill ran up my spine when I heard Angie repeat what I was almost sure would be the worst thing I'd ever said. "I... I mean, yes. I did say that. But... but..."

But nothing. Before I could finish my sentence, she had wedged me between her toes. I gagged at the scent. I knew she'd sometimes go for a day or two without a shower, but I never imagined how rancid it could make her feet smell. The fetid sweat and dirt that had accumulated there forced its way into my nose. And as she pushed my face down into the skin between her toes, a drop of sweat forced its way into my mouth. I gagged and heaved.

Soon she was wriggling her toes on either side of me, rubbing me into her and drenching me in her scent. I tried to struggle away, but with the sheer lack of power I seemed to have, she probably couldn't even tell. I was probably lucky for that.

"Angie... Angie, please." I coughed out the words when my face wasn't being forced nose-first into her sweat and skin. "I know what I said, but have some mercy!" Another drob of sweat rolled over me and I accidentally inhaled it, going into a coughing fit. When my breath started to return, I tried to continue. "I'm your brother for god's sake! You can't really want this, can you? How good can wedging me in your toes really feel?"

I had a sudden realization that I should again be more careful with my choice of words, but it was too late now. Hell, this might just be exactly what she wants anyway. And honestly, what could be worse than choking on my own sister's foot sweat?
155332222111111.title: The Power of a Word

1553322222.content:
So many doors to choose from. Passing through, you can tell that these are the fancies of other people, each one a different situation, a different world, where the only common element among this multitude is a little man named Jake suddenly finding himself at the mercy of titans. And yet, passing through here, you can't help but know that behind of these doors is your story, the story where you find Jake and treat him however you feel...

The only real question is, which door is yours?
1553322222.title: What a Diverse List...

choices: What kind of mess have you gotten yourself into?
15533222221.content:
The world around is far, far different than the one you fell asleep to. Before you're even able to see, you can already feel the chill in the air. There's an almost floral smell in the air that wafts over you as you wake bit by bit, and you can feel the slight taste of copper on your taste buds as you breathe in and out. None of these are particularly overpowering, though the chill is somewhat unnerving, yet the combination makes you feel somewhat off-balance.

All of this, however, pales compared to the sight that greets you when you blink your eyes open. Rather than a bed, you've woken up in a large pile of straw, though it's actually quite comfortable. The only thing on you is a pair of boxer briefs, red with white piping on them, and you feel the brushes of the straw against your bare skin as you move. You're not in a bedroom, obviously, and yet you're not in any sort of room or barn as you can define them. The walls are oddly pale and seem off somehow. You look around to the items around you: a big, foot-deep metal dish with water in it, a small trough of sorts with some wet carrots and apples inside - you feel your stomach loudly protest as you look there - and a pile of thick sticks each about two or three inches wide. Turning further, you see the last wall behind you, and a dawning realization sets in as you look on the big glass wall with thin slits reaching up from about four feet to near the ceiling. The whole composition takes shape around you, and you realize you can't classify this as any room for a reason! You're inside a giant cage!

The cage walls around you are a milky translucent color, faint enough to let light filter through but thick enough that you can't see more than vague blurry shapes. Out the front, though, you can see an enormous room before you. It looks like the storeroom of some kind of store, for you can see on the opposite side shelves with empty cages, gloves, and even a few folders full of papers. There's a table in the center of this room with a half-empty glass of water and another paper on it. From this angle, you can see the paper, but the words on it are strange and unfamiliar to you. You can smell a thick smoke in the air, as if someone's been puffing on a cigarette lately, and the distant sound of a soft melody playing from outside the room.

The door you can just barely see from inside your cage creaks open, and an unusual creature comes through. She looks almost human - complete, you notice, with a heavy chest - but her body is odd in several ways. For one, she's covered in a soft dusty brown fur, and her face is like some odd hybrid between a person's and a bear's. She's quite large for the room, which to you makes her a startlingly eighty or ninety feet. The behemoth bear woman wanders into the room, a weary expression her features, and looks around slowly...
15533222221.title: Caged!

155332222211.content:
"Jesus..." I rub my head as I sit up slowly. "Feels like I fell asleep in a barn..."

As my eyes begin to acclimate my surroundings, I look down and realize that I'm all but naked laying on a pile of rather thick hay. Or straw. I never really knew the difference. But hey. Not too far off, I guess, for the little comfort it provides. I stand up cautiously and look around, taking in my surroundings and trying harder not to panic with each glance.

The room I was in (And it had to be a room, I was surrounded by walls) was full of the straw I'd been laying on, though not piled up quite like my makeshift bed. The walls were white. Or, close to it. They were strikingly pale, which seemed to contrast the straw. How did you keep the walls so clean in a place I could only assume was full of animals on a regular basis... I turn my eyes to the floor. There's... a round trough? Some sort of water basin for whatever lives here, although it looks like a hamster's water bowl. And a similar structure full of what looked like some mixture of blocks of...carrot? Giant carrot? And maybe apples? It was huge, though. What ate this stuff... Whatever it was, I figured I'd rather not know.

I turned a full 180 degrees, and that's when I stopped and stared at the fourth wall. The enormous pane of glass that made it all too obvious where I was. I stared out through the enormous, slightly fogged wall onto an impossibly huge... office? Store? There was a table covered in paperwork. I ran forward, pressing myself against the glass as I stared out, trying to understand how this had happened and why I was apparently in some enormous cage fit for a human... I try to push my hand through one of the slits in the cage wall, but find it too thin to permit any more than my forearm. Just as I'm beginning to freak out, I see the door to the enormous store swing open, and in walks a woman that I can only describe as sort of humanoid...ish.

She's standing on two legs, and her figure is...well, let's say the two unnoticeable mounds on her chest as well as the rest of her indicate her as a buxom female. But from there everything's strange. She's covered in what looks like fur, and her face is some mixture of human and animal... a bear, if you had to guess. If the room is impossibly big, she still makes it look small. I'm not sure whether I should be terrified or in awe, and I wind up somewhere between the two.

Still, she's in the room and she's someone. For better or worse, I'm not passing up some sort of contact here.

"Hey!" I pound on the glass of my cage and shout through one of the air slits. "Heeeey! Over here! Where am I!? How did I get here? Hey! Help me out!"
155332222211.title: Despite All My Rage

choices: Let's look behind your door next, shall we?
Or maybe yours is a bit further down?
15533222222.content: Doors left, doors right. A thousand individuals in a thousand realities. Is the next one yours?
15533222222.title: A Veritable Hallway

155332222221.content:
My name is Brian, I am 6'1, a bit overweight, with short light brown hair. You had gone to school with me back in rhe day and I was just the smart guy who wasnt overtly popular, but everyone knew me. Recently I had begun work on a shrinking device, to achieve my dreams of shrinking myself and playing with my wife. Problem was, it was too risky to test on myself first, so I needed a guinea pig. I had saw you outside and figured you'd do.

I made sure no one was around and fired the device, and I watched you pass out as you dwindled down to 3 inches tall. It worked! In my excitement, I run over, scoop you up, and bring you inside. I drop you on my bed, and run off to the bathroom, my wife wasnt home, so I got some time with you to myself. I needed to try some stuff, cause after all, if everything works, the end game has me that tall playing with Ashley.

I open the door to come back into my bedroom, and find that you awoke! Huzzah! I walk over to the bed, footsteps booming, and stand near the edge of it. You are face to face with my crotch, onlya layer of boxers and denim separating you from It.

"Hey little buddy, hows it going? Boy I'd kill to be in your position."
155332222221.title: Enter Brian

choices: I had the distinct feeling it wasn't working.
1553322222211.content:
When I finally started to come around, I found myself on some large, plush surface. Wait, plush? I looked down, confused. I pressed on the ground and found it was almost a sort of fabric with a fair amount of give to it. That's weird. It almost felt like a giant comforter... I shrugged it off and turned my attention forward, freezing in terror as I realized why the ground seemed a whole lot like a bed. I was on a giant one in the middle of a giant room.

But I didn't have long to look around. The giant door to this giant bedroom swung open and in walked a giant who looked all too happy to see me there, awake and awaiting. He grinned as he walked up to me. I was close to the edge of the bed, I realized as with each booming step he grew closer. Finally, he stopped, legs bumping up against the bed, a notable bulge in his jeans practically looming over me. Heat wafted through the denim and the slightest smell came with it, creating an extremely uncomfortable aura that fell over me. I was speechless as I stared up at the giant who looked... almost familiar? Did I... Did I know him?

You spoke and I stared up, trying to get a good look past the jeans to your face and not sound terrified when I spoke. "Well, hey. I'll happy to...to trade places..." I tried to joke, but it came out with an obvious, underlying sound of terror.

"What do you want with me? What are you going to do?" I tried to maintain what little dignity I had as I challenged the giant, but even that simple question came out wavering and weak. I crossed my arms and tried to look like I wasn't scared, like he wasn't a million times my size.
1553322222211.title: A Bad Feeling...

15533222222111.content:
"What do I want with you? Why, you're a guinea pig good sir! I've been waiting to perfect this so I may one day see myself your size in front of my wife, but I'm not going to risk my own body yet when I haven't even tested the technology first, that's where you come in! But maybe, just maybe I'll take you up on your offer of trading places. Someday. Probably not. But you never know!"

The bulge in my pants seems to only get bigger as I finally come to grips with how well this actually worked. I excitedly pick you up, maybe clenching my fists a little harder than I meant to as I hold you in front of my face.

"However, unfortunately for you....since you're my guinea pig, you're gonna be in for a not so fun time, buddy. Sorry. The good news is, hopefully this should make you pliable, the bad news is, there's always a chance for failure and you just end up smooshed under some part of my body. I've been dreaming of this day for a looooooooooong time, and have plenty of ideas to enact. Oh, hold on a sec."

You see me close one of my eyes as I push a fart out of my ass, loud but not overly smelly. "Ah....that will probably be ONE of the ideas. But let's start with the basics." I let go of you and you fall on to my bed. I sit down near the head of the bed, shifting the blankets and such around to get into a comfortable spot. I prop my socked feet up in front of you, "Ah, yes. The classic. Rub my feet, please. If you think about not doing it, it will only get worse..."
15533222222111.title: I had the distinct feeling it wasn't working.

155332222222.content: The good news is there's always more room. The bad news is it can become quite a hike to reach the most recent door in line. But it's there, and it will always be reached.
155332222222.title: Down the Infinite Hall

1553322222221.content:
My name's Phil, and I sort of just invented a teleporter. Sort of.

I'd been in schools with you for a while, though we almost never shared a classroom together. I doubt you'd even remember me, really. But last fall, at the start of my junior year, I turned my garage into a makeshift lab and started experimenting with some ideas I'd had. The results were mixed, but finally I had something concrete. So now it just needed a real test run.

A few days ago, you answered my newspaper ad, and we set up for you coming down to be the first experiment. You either didn't remember me or were too polite to mention how I'd lost a lot of weight since being the chubby dark-skinned nerd in Earth Sciences. A short setup later, you stepped onto one of a pair of makeshift pads and gave me a somewhat nervous thumbs up.

And now, well, here we are. It worked. Sort of. Your clothes didn't go anywhere, but you vanished and about a tenth of a percent of you reappeared, at a scale of only six inches tall, on the other pad. And I'm standing here, looking down at a tiny naked guy on my garage floor, wondering just what to do now, and if you're even okay as you come to.
1553322222221.title: A Small Lab Accident...

1553322222222.content: Which door leads to your story?
1553322222222.title: Continuing the Hallway

info.brief_description: Come roleplay a sizeplay story with me. Always room for people! Details inside.(Updated!)
info.description:
NEW NEW UPDATE: Hey, all. I've been absent for way longer than I ever intended to be. Between work, college and other obligations, it's just been one thing after another. I promise I'll be responding to everyone's storylines as soon as I can, which should actually be really soon. I promise.

As always, I'm so incredibly grateful for all of your continuing interest and putting up with my erratic appearances on here. If things work out like I'd like, I should be adding with far more regularity starting very soon.

Thank you all so, so much. Every message I get telling me someone has added a chapter just lights up my day. Here's to you.

-

So, I've seen a few stories like this, and I wanted to try my hand at one.

The premise is simple. Two people, that being me and whoever feels like joining in, write chapters back and forth describing our actions and interactions between characters we'll choose to portray in a scenario revolving around a tiny person, and one much larger. The only necessary link between any of these scenarios will be the size play theme.

Truth be told, I tried this once before, but I might have been too strict on what I was willing to go along with, and it was a tremendous failure. So there are basically no rules to add or to join in this time around. I'm willing to experiment and try new things with this, branch out from my routine writings and have some new experiences.

That said, Rules
1. Content-wise, I'm allowing anything. Yes, anything. Whatever you're into, whatever you feel like doing, bring it on. Yes, that means even playing a dude is a-okay if you want to. I've been given a hard time for disallowing interaction like that in the past. No more. Whatever you write, I will play along with to the best of my ability. Half the fun is not being in control of everything here. I only ask that those participating take the role of the "giant", as it were. Every other element is free game.
2. In terms of writing, I think first-person (I did this. I said that.) would be preferable, but I'm not going to be a stickler if you want to switch it up. Your chapters are your call.
3. Only real rule is that I'd prefer additions be in proper English, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm certainly not going to turn someone interested away because of the way they type. Posts just have to be intelligible.
4. Oh, and detail is preferred. This sort of thing is no fun of detailed chapters are being answered with a sentence of "Then I did this action. Now what do you do?"

So please, add something. Start up a story, and I'll do my very best to complement it with chapters of my own. Let's have some fun here.
